rules_text:
When Ilcan Keyseeker enters, untap target creature and put a +1/+1 counter on it. If that creature is a Wonder, put an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
Reflect {3}{W} [i]({3}{W}: Create a token copy of this creature, except it's a 1/1 Wonder Human Wizard without reflect. Reflect only as a sorcery, and only once.)[/i]
